title: Patch 7.8
body: my problem is,my lol alpha client is taking too long to patch to 7.8 it took me 4 hours and its still at 40%.I already tried using the Hextech repair tool but it didn't work.

replies.body: finally its 71% now after waiting for 6 hours xD

I've been having a similar issue. On the Alpha client, it just stays at zero until an error shows up. Even when I launch the Legacy Client it comes up with the same error (at least the Legacy Client loads to 33% before failing). 
Hextech Repair tool didn't help at all.

On the flip side for this issue, between 0-33% your client is scanning the game files to see what needs to be updating. Getting an error here leans more towards a permissions issue than a connection one. Check out this [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) instead, and that should get you patching.

Once you get passed the 33% mark, your client starts to download all the new files it needs in order to fully patch. Any kind of errors at this point is a pretty good sign that something weird is going on between your network and our patching servers. The steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should be able to help you get to the bottom of it, but hit me back up if not!
